reviewText: This lady is a gem.  She is funny but really makes you think about everyday life.  Hearing and Hearing Impaired need to watch this one.

Kathy Buckley is truely a gift from above.  She reaches into your soul like no other.  Life has handed her so many challenges and she has risen above them all.  This tape will have you laughing one minute and crying the next.
I wish I could afford to buy a copy of this tape for each and every person I know.  We all have our pitty party days, but Kathy certainly will help you put your your own personal life in a much clearer light.
I also have her book and I could not stop reading it!!!  I stayed up all night because I wanted more and more of what Kathy has to share with us.  I sincerely think that anyone who reads her books and/or watches her tapes wll certainly never forget it!
